headline: S&P 500 Pair, Warren Buffet Pick Lead Five Stocks Near Buy Points Amid Market Shakeout
summary: S&P 500 members Intercontinental Exchange and Allstate lead this weekend's watch list of five stocks near buy points, showing resilience amid a market shakeout.  The list also includes TG Therapeutics, fitness-club operator Life Time Group and aerospace supplier Heico, which Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has bought recently.  TGTX is part of IBD's Leaderboard portfolio of elite stocks that has currently been winnowed down to just eight names.
